about_the_game: Jump right into this exciting multiplayer teaser for The Valiant, where you can face off against other players in Competitive mode, refine your skills offline in Skirmish mode against the AI, or work together in the co-operative mode “Last Man Standing.”
detailed_description: Jump right into this exciting multiplayer teaser for The Valiant, where you can face off against other players in Competitive mode, refine your skills offline in Skirmish mode against the AI, or work together in the co-operative mode “Last Man Standing.”

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460 (3.2 GHz) / AMD FX-8320 (3.5 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K (3.5 GHz) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X (3.6 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
